info.description: Allows the creation, viewing and management of payments and transfers
info.title: Order Payments APIs

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

parameters.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

productName.description: The name that is displayed for the product

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

lockedAmount.description: The amount of funds that have been blocked (reserved) for specific purposes

workingBalance.description: For Nostro and Internal Accounts, the same as Online Cleared Balance. For all other accounts it is the cleared balance plus the total of all unapproved debits.

onlineActualBalance.description: Balance of the account that represents total of transactions posted against the account excluding any entries with the processing date in the future.

availableBalance.description: Projected net movements of funds against the account. Depending on the setup in the field AVAILABLE.BAL.UPD in the ACCOUNT.PARAMETER record, may or may not include unauthorised debits, credits, both debits and credits.

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held

availableLimit.description: The amount of an allocated credit limit that is available for the nomniated customer to utilise

limitReference.description: Identifies the type of limit applicable to the Account

clearedBalance.description: Total of cleared funds booked against the account. Same as onlineActuaBalance except credit or reversed debit entries with the exposure date in the future.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Random and unique string for each page. Used for security purpose

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

bookingDate.description: The date on which the entry was generated. Normally, but not necessarily, the actual date at the time the entry is generated, e.g. if the previous day's business is still being processed after midnight, the actual date changes, but the run date is still the previous day.

transactionTotal.description: The total amount of the transaction

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

cardIssueId.description: The identifier of the issued card, consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

cardNumber.description: The cardType and number of the card. Card issues are defined with an ID consisting of three elements. The card type, a full stop and the card number. The card type must be a valid cardType. The card number may be any alphanumeric construction, e.g. VISA.1234567887654321 GC.1111222233334444 AB21.1111111122222222

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

cardType.description: The type of the card, e.g. Visa, Mastercard, etc.

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

currencyId.description: The identifier of the curreny. The is the 3 letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

fullCardNumber.description: The complete card number including the combination of bank codes, account number and other card convention

code.description: The identifier of the error message

lockReason.description: The reason the lock was applied

lockedAmount.description: The amount of funds that have been blocked (reserved) for specific purposes

code.description: The identifier of the error message
